insert into tSheet (CarNo, carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman, chk1, date) values (#{CarNo}, #{carSubmit}, #{carSubmitTel}, #{salesman}, 1, #{date})
select last_insert_id() as sheetID
mapper.select: select sheetID, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%y-%m-%d') as date, carSubmit, salesman from tSheet where carSubmitTel=#{carSubmitTel}
select sheetID, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%m/%d') as date, carSubmit, salesman from tSheet where CarNo=#{carNo} ORDER BY carSubmit, date
